Abstract Metric¶

class abstract_metric.Metric¶

Metric: This is an abstract class. This class is the responsible to consume messages from rabbitMQ and send the data to each observer subscribed to it. This class also treats each tenant as a topic, so it is able to distinguish for each observer in that tenant is subscribed. In this way, the metric actor only sends the necessary information to each observer.
